findings.lungs: mild dependent atelectasis, without consolidation or pleural effusion
findings.heart: normal in size, without pericardial effusion
findings.liver: multiple small hepatic hypodensities, suggestive of simple cysts
findings.kidneys: enhanced and excrete contrast symmetrically without hydronephrosis, stones, or worrisome renal masses; however, a focal cortical hypodensity in the left kidney too small to characterize

CT PELVIS.bowel_wall_thickening: marked involving the cecum with associated pericecal stranding
CT PELVIS.fluid: small amount in the right paracolic gutter adjacent to the appendix
CT PELVIS.appendix: normal in size, measuring 5 mm, with a small amount of air at the tip
CT PELVIS.colon: scattered diverticulosis without other foci of acute findings
CT PELVIS.free_fluid: small amount layering dependently in the pelvis

findings.osseous_structures: no fracture or worrisome bony lesion
